params.feeAmount: The portion of the total amount that FMP will keep as a fee.
params.totalAmount: The total amount of the asset.
params.userAmount: The portion of the total amount that is sent to the user.

params.nonce: The nonce provided by the caller on the source chain, used to correlate the source chain workflow segment with this segment.
params.startingAsset: The asset that was transferred from the source chain to this chain

params.userAddress: The user for which this workflow is executing.

params.inputAssetAmounts: The input assets, with the absolute amount of each asset.
params.result: The result returned form the step invocation.
params.stepAddress: The address of the step used for this invocation.
params.stepId: The logical id of the step (also repeated in the step param but duplicated here for convenience).
params.stepIndex: The index of the step in the Workflow.steps array.

getStepAddress(uint16).details: Retrieve the address associated with a stepId

getStepCount().details: getStepCount getStepInfoAt together allow enumeration of all steps

setStepAddress(uint16,address).details: Associate a new address with a stepId

RemainingAsset((uint8,address),uint256,u.notice: This event is emitted after the workflow has completed, once for each asset ramining with a non-zero amount.

WorkflowContinuation(uint256,address,((u.notice: This event is emitted when this is a continuation of a workflow from another chain

WorkflowExecution(address,((uint16,addre.notice: This event is emitted when a workflow execution begins.

WorkflowStepExecution(uint16,(uint16,add.notice: This event is emitted when immediately after invoking a step in the workflow.
